product_name: Thule Pack n' Pedal Urban Tote Pannier - Single
long_description: A rack-ready bike pannier disguised as a reusable tote, the Thule Pack n' Pedal Urban Tote Pannier hauls everyday items with comfortable handles and a shoulder strap. Rack-attachment system is easy to use, secure and vibration-free; it flips away when carried off the bike to provide maximum carrying comfort. Wide-mouth opening allows for larger items to fit easily inside. Exterior translucent pockets allow safety light to be used (light not included) and stored in 1 convenient location. Side stash pocket stores small items; reflective strips increase visibility. Integrated grab handles and detachable shoulder strap allow for multiple carrying options. Sold as a single, the Thule Pack n' Pedal Urban Tote Pannier features a universal fit on either side of the bike. Fits best on Thule Pack 'n Pedal Bike Racks (sold separately), but will work on virtually any bike rack.
short_description: A rack-ready bike pannier disguised as a reusable tote, the Thule Pack n' Pedal Urban Tote Pannier hauls everyday items with comfortable handles and a shoulder strap.
